articles.title: Kate and William’s ‘last-gasp bid to stop Denmark’s Megxit’ exposed - Express
articles.description: KATE MIDDLETON and her husband Prince William have allegedly offered their assistance to the Danish Royal Family, as reports have emerged that some senior royals may be about to break away in their own form of Megxit.

articles.title: Large crowds in Belfast join Black Lives Matter protests - ITV News
articles.description:
Large crowds of people chanting “I can’t breathe” and “No justice, no peace” have gathered outside Belfast City Hall to protest over the death of George Floyd in the US.

The 46-year-old black man died in police custody in Minneapolis last month.
